title: Cognitive Partnership Learning for Educational Application and Ethical Design of AI Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mathematical concepts and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: In a BYOD environment, integrating AI tools for mathematics problem-solving with ethics discussions, supplemented by workshops applying real-world cases from professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three mathematics problem-solving processes using AI tools
Learners can identify and discuss five ethical issues that may arise when applying AI technology in education
Learners can design collaborative learning strategies between humans and AI by applying the cognitive partnership model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
